price: How will they take heed, when a messenger who explained things clearly has already come to them?
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
